records.name: Belmar Beach

descriptions.hotel: Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
descriptions.direction: With a stay at Belmar Beach in Bodufolhudhoo, you'll be within a 5-minute walk of Ari Atoll and Folhudhoo Harbor. This hotel is 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Mathiveri Ferry Terminal and 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Sunset Beach.
descriptions.general: Located in Bodufolhudhoo and with Bodufolhudhoo Island Beach reachable within a few steps, Belmar Beach has a private beach area, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service. Staff on site can arrange airport transportation. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, an electric tea pot, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a closet. Guests at Belmar Beach can enjoy a continental breakfast.
descriptions.other: Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.
